int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t != 0 ) { int n ; scanf ( "
%d
" , & n ) ; int arr [ n ] , i , c = n , j = 0 , k = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; if ( n == 1 ) printf ( "%d
" , n ) ; else { while ( j != n - 1 ) { if ( arr [ j ] <= arr [ j + 1 ] ) k ++ ; else { while ( k != 0 ) { c = c + k ; k -- ; } } j ++ ; } if ( k != 0 ) { while ( k != 0 ) { c = c + k ; k -- ; } } printf ( "%d
" , c ) ; } t -- ; } return 0 ; }
